plot: Distraught over the death of his younger brother Mal, Igor visits a mysterious suburban psychic, with the hope of bringing Mal back to life.
title: Igor & Mal
plot_es: Distraught over the death of his younger brother Mal, Igor visits a mysterious suburban psychic, with the hope of bringing Mal back to life.
plot_en: Distraught over the death of his younger brother Mal, Igor visits a mysterious suburban psychic, with the hope of bringing Mal back to life.
